property radius¶
getSocketPosition(index: int, position: node_editor.node_socket.SocketPosition, num_out_of: int = 1) → List[float]¶

Overrides default GraphicalNode getSocketPosition to position the socket on the circular node.

paint(painter: PyQt5.QtGui.QPainter, option: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QStyleOptionGraphicsItem, widget: Optional[PyQt5.QtWidgets.QWidget] = Ellipsis) → None¶

Paint the node as filled circle of radius equal to heigth / 2
